eu.andlabs.studiolounge.gcp
Class Lounge

java.lang.Object
  eu.andlabs.studiolounge.gcp.Lounge

public class Lounge
extends java.lang.Object

The Lounge class starts and binds the background GCPService and provides an object oriented interface to integrate Lounge into Mobile Apps. The ServiceConnection needs to bind and unbind during Activity flow. 


















Nested Class Summary





static interface
Lounge.ChatListener



          This callback interface is used to subscribe chat messages.		





static class
Lounge.ChatMessage



          This class encapsulates chat messages.		





static interface
Lounge.GameMsgListener



          This callback interface is used to subscribe custom game messages.		





static interface
Lounge.LobbyListener



          This callback interface is used to subscribe game arrangement messages
